definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Its mild, not cold but not dry, young and old Safe.
sentences.chinese: 它的品性溫和，不涼不燥，男女老幼皆宜。

sentences.english: The product has the features of translucent, exquisite, pure white and gorgeous.
sentences.chinese: 具有高檔骨瓷的通透，細膩，白潔，華麗品性。

sentences.english: Anyone can be a servant. All it requires is character.
sentences.chinese: 其實每個人都能成爲公僕，需要的僅僅是一種品性。

sentences.english: Self-deceit will make him get lost in the forest of his own character.
sentences.chinese: 自欺欺人將使其自身迷失在自我品性的森林中。

sentences.chinese: 對蒜薹及蒜頭產量和商品性也有不同影響。

sentences.english: The U. S. Plan reaffirmed the nature of financial law lies in regulation and supervision.
sentences.chinese: 方案再次和反覆證明了規制與監管是金融法的品性。

sentences.english: Between persons of equal income there is no social distinction except the distinction of merit.
sentences.chinese: 收入相當的人除了品性迥異以外沒有社會差別。

sentences.english: Taste good, high quality, commodity nature is good.
sentences.chinese: 口感好，品質高，商品性佳。

sentences.english: Ornamental stones are a commodity and tourism geology resources.

sentences.english: Trouble may demolish a man's business but build up his character.
sentences.chinese: 患難也許會拆毀我們的事業，可是能建立我們的品性。

sentences.english: Kindness is one of his best attributes.
sentences.chinese: 心慈是他的好品性之一。

sentences.english: It is a sell-reliance and self-support economy with little commercial nature.

sentences.english: No hybrid roots crack root, skin smooth, commodity good spring, summer and autumn can be cultivated.

sentences.english: The plum of blossom, orchid, bamboo, chrysanthemum is known as four gentlemen in Chinese classic literature.
sentences.chinese: 梅蘭竹菊謂花中四君子，其品性值得我們仿學。

sentences.english: You are praising fortune and characters of ancient common people plebs .

sentences.english: All know what show character, naturally do not want to rent to show.
sentences.chinese: 榮華知道何秀的品性，自然不願意租給何秀。

definition: one's character/fret (on fingerboard of lute or guitar)
